blog.name: pendantstyles
blog.title: you bring me home
blog.description:
hannah | vision isn’t 20/20, but harry is!!

+ requests are always open! +

masterlist

summary: saw the one where teenage h wants Anne and Gemma out of the house? But what about them coming home earlier then he expected und...
question: saw the one where teenage h wants Anne and Gemma out of the house? But what about them coming home earlier then he expected und Anne catches him wanking. And the next time y/n comes over Gemma und Anne are just teasing him about it? God, I’m dead xx
answer:
“harry, can you please go to the store and buy some paper towels? we’ve run out of it! don’t know where it all went!”

“mum, do you have any vaseline? or lotion? any of those you aren’t using anymore? can i please have it? my stocks of those suddenly disappeared and i didn’t use them!”


oh god harry wants to sink in on the floor he’s standing up at now and he’s beyond flustered, not knowing if his cheeks could go any redder.

or if y/n can hold her breath long enough in her attempt to suppress her snickers and chuckles.

“very funny, mum. nice one, gem. kepp it together, y/n.”

he’s grumbling under his breath, proper huffing and scoffing about it as anne only rolls her eyes and gemma’s mouth widens in awe when she realizes that her mum was about to say the joke that popped in her mind — and if they have to explain, it’s harry’s fault he spoke those words because he should’ve known his mum’s remark was coming.

“oh come on, harry. stop being a wanker.”

“oh come on, harry. stop being a wanker.”

or if y/n can hold her breath long enough in her attempt to suppress her snickers and chuckles.

he’s grumbling under his breath, proper huffing and scoffing about it as anne only rolls her eyes and gemma’s mouth widens in awe when she realizes that her mum was about to say the joke that popped in her mind — and if they have to explain, it’s harry’s fault he spoke those words because he should’ve known his mum’s remark was coming.

oh god harry wants to sink in on the floor he’s standing up at now and he’s beyond flustered, not knowing if his cheeks could go any redder.

he’s grumbling under his breath, proper huffing and scoffing about it as anne only rolls her eyes and gemma’s mouth widens in awe when she realizes that her mum was about to say the joke that popped in her mind — and if they have to explain, it’s harry’s fault he spoke those words because he should’ve known his mum’s remark was coming.

summary: Hey! Coming to help u, what about harry waking up in the morning and decide to do a little photoshoot of y/n just completely...
question: Hey! Coming to help u, what about harry waking up in the morning and decide to do a little photoshoot of y/n just completely naked “for when i’m away, babe”
answer: and y/n’s gonna get all flustered and a bit self-insecure and harry wouldn’t have it because she’s absolutely so beautiful and he’d spend every waking day of his life trying to prove it if he has to and wow that is my heart breaking

+ requests are always open! +

masterlist

summary: Dad!Harry is the Harry with kids I'm assuming. Can you imagine him telling one kid off and regretting it? But he knows he can't...
question: Dad!Harry is the Harry with kids I'm assuming. Can you imagine him telling one kid off and regretting it? But he knows he can't apologise because how else will the kid learn from right and wrong. And so he zips his mouth and goes into the kitchen to distract himself from the overwhelming guilt.
answer: harry would be so overwhelmed with the urgency in him to apologize because he regretted it when he really shoudn’t have and he’d come to the missus for help and they’ll just talk all night agreeing with things about remorse flowing in them but not actually tolerating the concept that their kids would grow spoiled with the answers they’d like to hear and he’d be so into it he forgets what happened and he’ll be all soft and just let himself be comforted by the missus i am soft i wanna be the missus wow ded

summary: Okay, so bestfriend!harry always being able to tell when you're not in  a happy mood even when you try to pretend you are. And...
question: Okay, so bestfriend!harry always being able to tell when you're not in  a happy mood even when you try to pretend you are. And like, usually he'd come over and help / force you to relax but when he's on tour, he'd video call you asap or send one of his shitty jokes.
answer: yeah and when he does come over, he just takes it upon himself to stay the night there and would even sleep beside you just to make sure that you go to sleep and when he’s on tour, he doesn’t care how tired he is because his relief would be also relieving his best friend’s stress and i am screaming and so soft can i please have harry

reblog.comment: yeah and when he does come over, he just takes it upon himself to stay the night there and would even sleep beside you just to make sure that you go to sleep and when he’s on tour, he doesn’t care how tired he is because his relief would be also relieving his best friend’s stress and i am screaming and so soft can i please have harry
